vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Honey.getFreebie (patch_16.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_16.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_16.sol#15)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_16.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_16.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Honey.command (patch_16.sol#25-29):
	-require(bool)(_adr.call.value(msg.value)(_data)) patch_16.sol#28

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_adr' of Honey.command (patch_16.sol#25) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_data' of Honey.command (patch_16.sol#25) is not in mixedCase
